featured.title: psych ward room optimization
featured.summary: inpatient psych ward space optimization with linear programming
featured.full_description: Inpatient psych ward space optimization using linear programming

expanded_content.problem: optimizing room assignments in a 26-bed psychiatric facility while balancing patient acuity levels, staff resources, and safety constraints
expanded_content.approach: linear programming with pulp library. modeled complex constraints including patients deemed unsafe for others or themselves requiring their own room, other patients could double in a room
expanded_content.results: achieved 99.99% bed utilization efficiency through optimal configuration of 10 single rooms and 8 double rooms (vs current all-double configuration), reducing bed waste from 52 to just 2 beds over 4-month test period while maintaining patient safety requirements
expanded_content.impact: presented at apa conference. adopted by original facilities. demonstrates practical application of operations research in healthcare

featured.title: geo causal inference
featured.summary: measuring causal effects of marketing interventions with time-based regression (tbr) with matched...
featured.full_description: Measuring causal effects of marketing interventions using Time-Based Regression (TBR) with Matched Markets methodology

expanded_content.problem: measuring true causal effects of marketing interventions when randomized direct experiments aren't feasible
expanded_content.approach: time-based regression with matched markets methodology. leverages geographic variation as natural experiments
expanded_content.results: identified promising geo regions for TV ad implementation and enabled confident impact assessment
expanded_content.impact: enables data-driven marketing decisions with rigorous statistical backing

featured.title: signal 23.ai
featured.summary: building rag system on top of notion documentation for signal 23 artist
featured.full_description: Building RAG system on top of Notion documentation for signal 23 artist

expanded_content.problem: artist's notion documentation scattered across multiple sources. fans needed unified knowledge interface
expanded_content.approach: rag system with faiss/pgvector for semantic search. custom cyberpunk ui matching artist aesthetic
expanded_content.results: 95% relevance accuracy on test queries. created eerie artifact communicating in broken language for atmospheric effect
expanded_content.impact: enhances fan engagement through ai-powered knowledge discovery

featured.title: content pulse
featured.summary: llm-powered content aggregator and analyzer for extracting real-time insights from social media a...
featured.full_description: LLM-powered content aggregator and analyzer for extracting real-time insights from social media and news sources

expanded_content.problem: crypto market moves faster than human analysis can track. signal often buried in social media noise
expanded_content.approach: real-time ingestion from multiple sources. llm-powered sentiment extraction and trend identification
expanded_content.results: personal tool for scraping multiple news outlets in the morning
expanded_content.impact: provides traders with early market intelligence through automated analysis

featured.title: econdash
featured.summary: airflow and postgresql data pipeline for bea economic data
featured.full_description: Airflow and PostgreSQL data pipeline for BEA economic data

expanded_content.problem: economic data scattered across federal agencies. manual collection error-prone and time-consuming
expanded_content.approach: airflow orchestration with bea api integration. postgresql storage with dbt transformations
expanded_content.results: automated daily updates of 50+ economic indicators. 99.9% pipeline reliability
expanded_content.impact: enables real-time economic analysis with production-grade infrastructure

featured.title: ethoscope
featured.summary: comprehensive ethereum network monitoring platform tracking gas prices, mev activity, and l2 migr...
featured.full_description: Comprehensive Ethereum network monitoring platform tracking gas prices, MEV activity, and L2 migration patterns with real-time ETL pipeline and predictive analytics

expanded_content.problem: ethereum network health monitoring requires real-time analysis of gas prices, mev activity, and l2 migration patterns across fragmented data sources
expanded_content.approach: real-time etl pipeline with web3.py and alchemy api. timescaledb for efficient time-series storage. prophet and scikit-learn for predictive analytics
expanded_content.results: automated collection of blockchain metrics with reliable data ingestion. comprehensive historical data storage for trend analysis
expanded_content.impact: personal tool for understanding ethereum metrics and gaining hands-on experience in the web3 space

featured.title: ope base
featured.summary: analytics platform for tracking music artist engagement across twitter, instagram, and reddit. im...
featured.full_description: Analytics platform for tracking music artist engagement across Twitter, Instagram, and Reddit. Implements bot detection with Isolation Forest, clustering for user segmentation, and trend analysis to optimize content strategy

expanded_content.problem: music artists lack data-driven insights for content strategy. engagement patterns obscured by bots and noise
expanded_content.approach: multi-year social media tracking with ml analysis. isolation forest for bot detection, clustering for audience segmentation
expanded_content.results: identified optimal posting times, content types, and audience segments. detected 15-20% bot activity in engagement metrics
expanded_content.impact: enabled data-driven content strategy for independent artists. insights applicable across music industry

featured.title: arcope website
featured.summary: interactive website for solo electronic project arcope featuring network/data aesthetics inspired...
featured.full_description: Interactive website for solo electronic project Arcope featuring network/data aesthetics inspired by Odesza

expanded_content.problem: solo electronic music project needed web presence reflecting odesza-inspired sound and data/network aesthetics
expanded_content.approach: react with framer motion animations. vibe-coded frontend exploring creative web development outside backend comfort zone
expanded_content.results: interactive site with network-inspired visuals matching the musical aesthetic. deployed on netlify with docker dev environment
expanded_content.impact: demonstrates versatility beyond backend/data work. shows willingness to learn and experiment with new domains

featured.summary: vibrant website for electronic dance duo lost in tropez with retro psychedelic aesthetics inspire...

expanded_content.approach: typescript react with vite build system. embraced experimental frontend development to match group's playful energy
